name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **TypeScript**, **React**, **C#**, **.NET**, and cloud platforms including **Azure** and **AWS**. Proficient in modern development practices such as **CI/CD**, **Terraform**, and **Kubernetes** for scalable and reliable system deployments.
Extensive knowledge in AI/ML implementations that enhance predictive analytics and automation processes. Adept at transforming user stories into effective design documentation and technical specifications. Demonstrated ability to align solutions with rigorous compliance standards such as HIPAA and FHIR.
Well-equipped to leverage emerging technologies, with a solid foundation in **Rust**, **Go**, and **C++**, enabling innovative solutions in digital identity and open banking frameworks. Exceptional communication skills foster collaboration across cross-functional teams.
